knimeNode.name: Database Query
knimeNode.shortDescription: Modifies the input SQL query from a incoming database connection.

fullDescription.intro: Modifies the input SQL query from a incoming database connection. The SQL query is represented by the place holder #view# and will replaced during execute. The new database connection then available at the out-port. The database connection settings itself are not modified.
fullDescription.option: Enter a new database query. Don't removed the #view# place holder which represents the incoming SQL statement.

ports.outPort: Database connection with wrapped SQL query
